channel.title: How to make NPCs Talk
channel.description: right, ive added an xmas event, and made santa talk, but you have to talk to npc #66 the gnome dude, and i added the cases and made it talk, but ive added 3 cases because its talking 3 times, but when i talk to it, it only shows one case, the first one, how do i make it keep talking?

item.title: How to make NPCs Talk
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

right, ive added an xmas event, and made santa talk, but you have to talk to npc #66 the gnome dude, and i added the cases and made it talk, but ive added 3 cases because its talking 3 times, but when i talk to it, it only shows one case, the first one, how do i make it keep talking?
